channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Smithsonian Folklife Festival Gives Way to Trump’s Patriotic Fair
item.description: The summer festival, held annually since 1967, will not take place as usual on the National Mall, which will instead host the president’s Great Americ...

item.title: Moltbook is the talk of Silicon Valley. But the furor is eerily reminiscent of a 2017 Facebook research experiment
item.description: As Fortune’s Jeremy Kahn points out, we’ve seen this film before.

item.title: Gateway Tunnel Project Begins to Wind Down as Trump Halts Federal Funding
item.description: Nearly all of the work was scheduled to stop on Friday unless federal officials agreed to restore funding that had been halted last year or a court or...

item.title: Jim Carrey nearly quit ‘Grinch’ and offered to return his $20 million paycheck. Then the founder of SEAL Team Six came to the rescue
item.description: "Jim started having panic attacks. I would see him lying down on the floor in between setups with a brown paper bag."

item.title: Iran Is at Work on Missile and Nuclear Sites, Satellite Images Show
item.description: Repairs at key missile sites began soon after they were hit by Israeli and U.S. strikes last year, but work at Iran’s nuclear facilities has been slow...

item.title: Sam Altman should take Niklas Östberg’s number—what the Delivery Hero founder doesn’t know about going public and shareholders isn’t worth knowing
item.description: A founder-CEO who rode out shareholder backlash, Niklas Östberg’s journey at Delivery Hero shows how long-term conviction can survive—and even thrive—...

item.title: Your Super Bowl party can beat inflation, Wells Fargo says. Just double down on wings and guac and skip the beef
item.description: "If you can't get excited about a big plate of chicken wings and cheesy nachos with guacamole, I don't know what's going to make you happy."

item.title: How e.l.f. Beauty has used Super Bowl ads to rocket from 10% brand awareness to 40%
item.description: CFO Mandy Fields discusses the strategy finance and marketing use to help the brand reach new shoppers.

item.title: Latest U.S. Boat Strike Kills 2 in Pacific
item.description: The operation was authorized by the Marine general who took command of military operations in Latin America and the Caribbean earlier in the day.

item.title: Trump Shares Video Portraying the Obamas as Apes
item.description: The White House press secretary dismissed criticism of the clip’s racist content, shared by the president’s Truth Social account, as “fake outrage.”

item.title: U.S. and Iran Set for Talks in Oman
item.description: Abbas Araghchi, the minister, said the two sides had agreed to continue negotiations at a later date. The U.S. delegation had yet to comment.

item.title: Iran Is at Work on Missile and Nuclear Sites, Satellite Images Show
item.description: Repairs at key missile sites began soon after they were hit by Israeli and U.S. strikes last year, but work at Iran’s nuclear facilities has been slow...

item.title: Russian General Is Shot in Moscow
item.description: The attack bore the hallmark of several assassination attempts on top military officers in the Russian capital.

item.title: Norway Rallies Behind Royals, Despite Dismay Over Epstein Links
item.description: The future queen’s links to Jeffrey Epstein, and her son’s rape trial, have disappointed many Norwegians. But there is still widespread support for th...

item.title: U.S. and Iranian Officials Meet in Oman for Talks
item.description: Iran’s foreign minister said that talks in Oman with U.S. officials aimed at preventing another conflict in the region were off to a “good start.”
